title: Through my eyes: Stradbroke Primary School, South Australia (TEFC)
creator_credit: Donald Crombie, Timothy Read and Film Australia
brief_description: Aims to show how open plan school design and method offers greater scope for flexibility in teaching approaches at the infants school level. Designed primarily for in-service use by informed teacher audiences.
